sentences: Ära lase ta ennast lollitada. Ta püüab teid petta ja lollitada.
"Aulik aagrehikohus, mul ei ole homme võimalik linna minna," lollitasin tõsiselt vastu.
.. hüppas talle naerdes ja lollitades kallale ja lükkas ta selili.
context: The Estonian word 'lolli' appears to be related to the verb form 'lollitama' which means to make fun of, mock, or deceive someone. It can also refer to playing the fool or acting foolishly. The word has connotations of trickery, deception, and humorous or playful mocking behavior.
